name: YARBAY
description:
welcome to the Black Lion’s Universe!


The atmosphere, character development, tactical game mechanics, unexpected happenings…

This game includes a storyline that prioritizes the story itself with many emotions, will surely influence you deep down. To add, with new generation graphics and a fun playthrough that draws you in, we strive to give our players a unique and quality gameplay experience.

now In Early Access, In 6 Languages!


We officially thank the players who supported/will support us in the early access which includes two chapters and some extra packs. We're aiming to complete the Full Version until or close to February 2020, we also thank to those who not only supported us, but also joined the early access and helped testing the gameplay prior to Full Version. Forget not, we'll be exhibiting the gameplay of early access chapters to you firstly, and with your responses and recommendations, we will shape the game YARBAY together!

just An Ordinary Mission…


Commander Cihangir is a competent fighter pilot in the Air Forces, but his home country, Turkey, hasn't been in a war since long, so his field experience is getting rusty day by day. That's why, Lt. Col. Cihangir goes under the military education and necessary procedures, to fight against the terrorism, to lead the air combat unit cross-border. But nothing is as it seems…

the Enemy Won't Stay Silent.


Proceeding with hit and retreat like making it rain against your fierce enemies? Our enemies must be from the Neolithic Age, huh.
If they are not, this won't be easy, ever.
What will happen to Cihangir, who's far away from his home, who's standing on enemy lands?
One can only learn by living the experience.
Just like our destinies.
You'll feel the war.
